Articles.Content:
While passing by a maneuver node at time warp while on suborbital trajectory.

Rebooting.

Rebooting the Mission Control computers after having a bug. It appears the probe has crashed into Kerbol...

Making a cake.

Making a cake from solid fuel!

Having a drink of water

Melted from munar ice.

Flying on a commercial airline.

Flying on a commercial airline, on a suborbital trajectory of the Sun. (stupid tourists)

Taking a picture

taking a picture of eve's ocean for a postcard saying "wish you were here. to rescue me."

making a game(wich I have finaly finished. link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/63173812/#player)

Making a game of kicking soccer balls through the Mun arches!

Remember the world cup mod?

Reminiscing.

Oh man. Soccer balls FTW

anyways. Reminiscing with a friend while you're supposed to be letting mission control know you blew up their ship.

Being mischievous.

While building a 30 stage asparagus lifter.

Pressing a button.

pressing the button.

Doodling.

doodling a schematic for a duna lander with rover.

singing.

Singing "Space Oddity" while in orbit!

Using a wrench.

Using a rocket boosted wrench.

making mac n cheese

Making mystery goo flavored Mac and cheese

Drinking a soda

Drinking a soda and eating snacks.

Doing history homework

Homework about the history of Kerbal rocketry (the paper is made from a conspicuous green substance found on the launchpad)

Running cross-country

Running cross-country after lighting the fuse on Jeb's Eve return mission.

Thinking out loud

Thinking out loud you missed your orbit, your now on an escape trajectory ; )

Never rescale your claw ; )

Never rescaling the klaw, rather, rescaling the asteroids to make them more grabbable!

Eating a banana.

Eating a banana surface attached to a piston.

Cooking french fries because 4:26 AheM ; )

Cooking french fries in a vat of liquid fuel headed by rocket engines (Remember kids, grease fires are dangerous, especially when that grease is actually rocket fuel).

Riding a bike.

Riding a bike with 20 Space Shuttle SRBs strapped to it.

Eating food.

Eating food roasted with more booster toaster during a launch.

(i was more thinking about a scale down + girder for fuel transfer thanks to it's native crossfeed // // suspension + dock alignement planet surface and lambda crafts weights decals related things)

Waiting because sometime, hey it happen.

Edited May 22, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''

Waiting for that darn rescue ship to bring me off the Mun.

Having a party!

Launching fireworks.

BIG fireworks.

Kerbal fireworks.

Eating snacks.
